text: Debattama Saha is an Indian television actress known for playing the role of Anokhi in Shaurya Aur Anokhi Ki Kahani. == Early life == Debattama Saha completed her studies from Don Bosco High School, Silchar and graduated in English Honours from Amity University, Kolkata."I never thought that I'll become an actress: Debattama Saha". The Times of India. 17 March 2018. Retrieved 7 January 2021. == Career == Saha made Hindi TV debut in 2019 with Sony TV's Ishaaron Ishaaron Mein as Dr. Parineeti Ganguly opposite Mudit Nayar. Since December 2020, she is playing the role of Anokhi Bhalla in StarPlus's Shaurya Aur Anokhi Ki Kahani opposite Karanvir Sharma. == Filmography == === Television === Year Show Role Notes 2019–2020 Ishaaron Ishaaron Mein Dr. Parineeti "Pari" Ganguly Hindi Television Debut 2020–present Shaurya Aur Anokhi Ki Kahani Anokhi Bhalla Lead role == References == == Other websites == * Category:1997 births Category:Living people
title: Debattama Saha
